meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4379.

td.p: Ashley Smith, an eleven-year-old seventh-grader from Greencastle, Indiana
Deirdre Kessler, a ten-year-old from Brooklyn, New York
Ranz Errazo, a sixth-grader from Goose Creek, South Carolina

tr.td: STATE CAPITALS
C D "B"
IN THE BOOKSTORE
BASEBALL
4-LETTER BODY PARTS
WEBSTER'S 3rd P. 2004
